text: Assignee was an American Thoroughbred racehorse. He won the 1894 Preakness Stakes. ==References== Category:Racehorses bred in the United States Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:Preakness Stakes winners Category:1891 racehorse births Category:Thoroughbred family 2 Category:Godolphin Arabian sire line
title: Assignee (horse)
